secretRef.description: Name of the Container App secret from which to pull the environment variable value.

WorkloadProfileName.description: Workload profile name for container apps to execute on.

WorkloadProfileType.description: Workload profile type for container apps to execute on.

probes.description: List of probes for the container.

ContainerAppProbe.description: Probe describes a health check to be performed against a container to determine whether it is alive or ready to receive traffic.

failureThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive failures for the probe to be considered failed after having succeeded. Defaults to 3. Minimum value is 1. Maximum value is 10.

httpGet.description: HTTPGet specifies the http request to perform.

host.description: Host name to connect to, defaults to the pod IP. You probably want to set "Host" in httpHeaders instead.

httpHeaders.description: Custom headers to set in the request. HTTP allows repeated headers.

items.description: HTTPHeader describes a custom header to be used in HTTP probes

path.description: Path to access on the HTTP server.

port.description: Name or number of the port to access on the container. Number must be in the range 1 to 65535. Name must be an IANA_SVC_NAME.

scheme.description: Scheme to use for connecting to the host. Defaults to HTTP.

initialDelaySeconds.description: Number of seconds after the container has started before liveness probes are initiated. Minimum value is 1. Maximum value is 60.

periodSeconds.description: How often (in seconds) to perform the probe. Default to 10 seconds. Minimum value is 1. Maximum value is 240.

successThreshold.description: Minimum consecutive successes for the probe to be considered successful after having failed. Defaults to 1. Must be 1 for liveness and startup. Minimum value is 1. Maximum value is 10.

tcpSocket.description: TCPSocket specifies an action involving a TCP port. TCP hooks not yet supported.

host.description: Optional: Host name to connect to, defaults to the pod IP.

port.description: Number or name of the port to access on the container. Number must be in the range 1 to 65535. Name must be an IANA_SVC_NAME.

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Optional duration in seconds the pod needs to terminate gracefully upon probe failure. The grace period is the duration in seconds after the processes running in the pod are sent a termination signal and the time when the processes are forcibly halted with a kill signal. Set this value longer than the expected cleanup time for your process. If this value is nil, the pod's terminationGracePeriodSeconds will be used. Otherwise, this value overrides the value provided by the pod spec. Value must be non-negative integer. The value zero indicates stop immediately via the kill signal (no opportunity to shut down). This is an alpha field and requires enabling ProbeTerminationGracePeriod feature gate. Maximum value is 3600 seconds (1 hour)

timeoutSeconds.description: Number of seconds after which the probe times out. Defaults to 1 second. Minimum value is 1. Maximum value is 240.

CustomScaleRule.description: Container App container Custom scaling rule.

type.description:
Type of the custom scale rule
eg: azure-servicebus, redis etc.

metadata.description: Metadata properties to describe custom scale rule.

auth.description: Authentication secrets for the custom scale rule.

CustomDomainConfiguration.description: Configuration properties for apps environment custom domain

customDomainVerificationId.description: Id used to verify domain name ownership

dnsSuffix.description: Dns suffix for the environment domain

code.description: Standardized string to programmatically identify the error.

message.description: Detailed error description and debugging information.

target.description: Detailed error description and debugging information.

code.description: Standardized string to programmatically identify the error.

message.description: Detailed error description and debugging information.

target.description: Detailed error description and debugging information.

HttpScaleRule.description: Container App container Http scaling rule.

metadata.description: Metadata properties to describe http scale rule.

auth.description: Authentication secrets for the custom scale rule.

TcpScaleRule.description: Container App container Tcp scaling rule.

metadata.description: Metadata properties to describe tcp scale rule.

auth.description: Authentication secrets for the tcp scale rule.

QueueScaleRule.description: Container App container Azure Queue based scaling rule.

auth.description: Authentication secrets for the queue scale rule.

minReplicas.description: Optional. Minimum number of container replicas.

maxReplicas.description: Optional. Maximum number of container replicas. Defaults to 10 if not set.

secretRef.description: Name of the secret from which to pull the auth params.

triggerParameter.description: Trigger Parameter that uses the secret

identity.description: Resource ID of a managed identity to authenticate with Azure Key Vault, or System to use a system-assigned identity.

keyVaultUrl.description: Azure Key Vault URL pointing to the secret referenced by the container app.

Template.description:
Container App versioned application definition.
Defines the desired state of an immutable revision.
Any changes to this section Will result in a new revision being created

revisionSuffix.description: User friendly suffix that is appended to the revision name

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Optional duration in seconds the Container App Instance needs to terminate gracefully. Value must be non-negative integer. The value zero indicates stop immediately via the kill signal (no opportunity to shut down). If this value is nil, the default grace period will be used instead. Set this value longer than the expected cleanup time for your process. Defaults to 30 seconds.

initContainers.description: List of specialized containers that run before app containers.

containers.description: List of container definitions for the Container App.

scale.description: Scaling properties for the Container App.

volumes.description: List of volume definitions for the Container App.

serviceBinds.description: List of container app services bound to the app

Volume.description: Volume definitions for the Container App.

storageType.description: Storage type for the volume. If not provided, use EmptyDir.

storageName.description: Name of storage resource. No need to provide for EmptyDir and Secret.

secrets.description: List of secrets to be added in volume. If no secrets are provided, all secrets in collection will be added to volume.

mountOptions.description: Mount options used while mounting the AzureFile. Must be a comma-separated string.

SecretVolumeItem.description: Secret to be added to volume.

secretRef.description: Name of the Container App secret from which to pull the secret value.

path.description: Path to project secret to. If no path is provided, path defaults to name of secret listed in secretRef.

VolumeMount.description: Volume mount for the Container App.

volumeName.description: This must match the Name of a Volume.

mountPath.description: Path within the container at which the volume should be mounted.Must not contain ':'.

subPath.description: Path within the volume from which the container's volume should be mounted. Defaults to "" (volume's root).

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

ignoreErrors.description: Boolean describing if the component errors are ignores

secrets.description: Collection of secrets used by a Dapr component

secretStoreComponent.description: Name of a Dapr component to retrieve component secrets from

scopes.description: Names of container apps that can use this Dapr component

serviceComponentBind.description: List of container app services that are bound to the Dapr component

secretRef.description: Name of the Dapr Component secret from which to pull the metadata property value.

DaprComponentServiceBinding.description: Configuration to bind a Dapr Component to a dev ContainerApp Service

serviceId.description: Resource id of the target service

DaprSecretsCollection.description: Dapr component Secrets Collection for ListSecrets Action.

value.description: Collection of secrets used by a Dapr component

DaprSecret.description: Dapr component Secret for ListSecrets Action

ExtendedLocation.description: The complex type of the extended location.

name.description: The name of the extended location.

type.description: The type of the extended location.

DaprComponentResiliencyPoliciesCollectio.description: Dapr Component Resiliency Policies ARM resource.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

properties.description: Dapr Component Resiliency Policy resource specific properties

inboundPolicy.description: The optional inbound component resiliency policy configuration

outboundPolicy.description: The optional outbound component resiliency policy configuration

httpRetryPolicy.description: The optional HTTP retry policy configuration

DaprComponentResiliencyPolicyHttpRetryPo.description: Dapr Component Resiliency Policy HTTP Retry Policy Configuration.

maxRetries.description: The optional maximum number of retries

DaprComponentResiliencyPolicyHttpRetryBa.description: Dapr Component Resiliency Policy HTTP Retry Backoff Configuration.

initialDelayInMilliseconds.description: The optional initial delay in milliseconds before an operation is retried

maxIntervalInMilliseconds.description: The optional maximum time interval in milliseconds between retry attempts

DaprComponentResiliencyPolicyTimeoutPoli.description: Dapr Component Resiliency Policy Timeout Policy Configuration.

responseTimeoutInSeconds.description: The optional response timeout in seconds

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

properties.description: Dapr PubSub Event Subscription resource specific properties

scopes.description: Application scopes to restrict the subscription to specific apps.

maxMessagesCount.description: Maximum number of messages to deliver in a bulk message.

maxAwaitDurationMs.description: Maximum duration in milliseconds to wait before a bulk message is sent to the app.

DaprSubscriptionRoutes.description: Dapr PubSub Event Subscription Routes configuration.

rules.description: The list of Dapr PubSub Event Subscription Route Rules.

default.description: The default path to deliver events that do not match any of the rules.

DaprSubscriptionRouteRule.description: Dapr Pubsub Event Subscription Route Rule is used to specify the condition for sending a message to a specific path.

match.description: The optional CEL expression used to match the event. If the match is not specified, then the route is considered the default. The rules are tested in the order specified, so they should be define from most-to-least specific. The default route should appear last in the list.

path.description: The path for events that match this rule

accountName.description: Storage account name for azure file.

accountKey.description: Storage account key for azure file.

Certificate.description: Certificate used for Custom Domain bindings of Container Apps in a Managed Environment

subjectAlternativeNames.description: Subject alternative names the certificate applies to.

certificateType.description: The type of the certificate. Allowed values are `ServerSSLCertificate` and `ImagePullTrustedCA`

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

tags.description: Application-specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.

ManagedCertificate.description: Managed certificates used for Custom Domain bindings of Container Apps in a Managed Environment

error.description: Any error occurred during the certificate provision.

domainControlValidation.description: Selected type of domain control validation for managed certificates.

validationToken.description: A TXT token used for DNS TXT domain control validation when issuing this type of managed certificates.

tags.description: Application-specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.

httpRetryPolicy.description: Policy that defines http request retry conditions

tcpRetryPolicy.description: Policy that defines tcp request retry conditions

circuitBreakerPolicy.description: Policy that defines circuit breaker conditions

httpConnectionPool.description: Defines parameters for http connection pooling

tcpConnectionPool.description: Defines parameters for tcp connection pooling

responseTimeoutInSeconds.description: Timeout, in seconds, for a request to respond

connectionTimeoutInSeconds.description: Timeout, in seconds, for a request to initiate a connection

HttpRetryPolicy.description: Policy that defines http request retry conditions

maxRetries.description: Maximum number of times a request will retry

initialDelayInMilliseconds.description: Initial delay, in milliseconds, before retrying a request

maxIntervalInMilliseconds.description: Maximum interval, in milliseconds, between retries

matches.description: Conditions that must be met for a request to be retried

headers.description: Headers that must be present for a request to be retried

httpStatusCodes.description: Additional http status codes that can trigger a retry

errors.description: Errors that can trigger a retry

TcpRetryPolicy.description: Policy that defines tcp request retry conditions

maxConnectAttempts.description: Maximum number of attempts to connect to the tcp service

CircuitBreakerPolicy.description: Policy that defines circuit breaker conditions

consecutiveErrors.description: Number of consecutive errors before the circuit breaker opens

intervalInSeconds.description: The time interval, in seconds, between endpoint checks. This can result in opening the circuit breaker if the check fails as well as closing the circuit breaker if the check succeeds. Defaults to 10s.

maxEjectionPercent.description: Maximum percentage of hosts that will be ejected after failure threshold has been met

HttpConnectionPool.description: Defines parameters for http connection pooling

http1MaxPendingRequests.description: Maximum number of pending http1 requests allowed

http2MaxRequests.description: Maximum number of http2 requests allowed

TcpConnectionPool.description: Defines parameters for tcp connection pooling

maxConnections.description: Maximum number of tcp connections allowed

HeaderMatch.description: Conditions required to match a header
